Package com.facetec.sdk

Class FaceTecOverlayCustomization

java.lang.Object
com.facetec.sdk.FaceTecOverlayCustomization
public final class FaceTecOverlayCustomization extends Object
Customize the Overlay.
The Overlay separates the User Interface from the presenting application, covering the device's full screen.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    int
    backgroundColor
    Color of the Overlay background.
    int
    brandingImage
    Image displayed below the Frame on top of the Overlay.
    Default is configured to use image named 'facetec_your_app_logo' located in application's res/drawable folder.
    boolean
    showBrandingImage
    Control whether to show the branding image the Frame on top of the Overlay.
    Default is true (shown).

  • Field Details

    • backgroundColor

      public int backgroundColor
      Color of the Overlay background. Default is white.

    • brandingImage

      @DrawableRes public int brandingImage
      Image displayed below the Frame on top of the Overlay.
      Default is configured to use image named 'facetec_your_app_logo' located in application's res/drawable folder.

    • showBrandingImage

      public boolean showBrandingImage
      Control whether to show the branding image the Frame on top of the Overlay.
      Default is true (shown).
